tool.name: SAFETYFACTOR
tool.description: This tool computes a slope stability (expressed as a factor-of-safety) raster according to the traditional infinite slope model theory (see cf Selby, 1993) The resulting raster represents the ratio of resisting forces/driving forces (fs) on a potential shear plane with fs lesser 1 unstable, fs greater 1 stable. Except for a slope raster (in radians), all input variables can be specified either globally or distributed (through grids). The tool creates a continuous fs raster (values above 10 are truncated), and a binary stability grid with nodata = stable, 1 = unstable (optional).

param.name: A
param.label: Slope grid (rad)
param.help: Slope grid (rad)

param.name: Bmin
param.label: Min thickness grid (m)
param.help: A grid representing minimum cell layer thicknesses to potential shear plane (in meters)

param.name: Bmax
param.label: Max thickness grid (m)
param.help: A grid representing maximum cell layer thicknesses to potential shear plane (in meters)

param.name: Cmin
param.label: Min saturation grid (-)
param.help: A grid representing minimum cell relative water saturation of layer (dimensionless)

param.name: Cmax
param.label: Max saturation grid (-)
param.help: A grid representing maximum cell relative water saturation of layer (dimensionless)

param.name: Dmin
param.label: Min friction grid (degree)
param.help: A grid representing minimum cell frictional shear strength of layer (in degrees)

param.name: Dmax
param.label: Max friction grid (degree)
param.help: A grid representing maximum cell frictional shear strength of layer (in degrees)

param.name: Emin
param.label: Min density grid (g/cm3)
param.help: A grid representing minimum cell bulk density of layer (in grams per cubiccentimeters)

param.name: Emax
param.label: Max density grid (g/cm3)
param.help: A grid representing maximum cell bulk density of layer (in grams per cubiccentimeters)

param.name: Fmin
param.label: Min cohesion grid (MPa)
param.help: A grid representing minimum cell layer cohesion (in Megapascals)

param.name: Fmax
param.label: Max cohesion grid (MPa)
param.help: A grid representing maximum cell layer cohesion (in Megapascals)

param.name: fBmin
param.label: Min global thickness (m)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fBmax
param.label: Max global thickness (m)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fCmin
param.label: Min global saturation (-)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fCmax
param.label: Max global saturation (-)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fDmin
param.label: Min global friction (degree)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fDmax
param.label: Max global friction (degree)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fEmin
param.label: Min global density (g/cm3)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fEmax
param.label: Max global density (g/cm3)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fFmin
param.label: Min global cohesion (MPa)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fFmax
param.label: Max global cohesion (MPa)
param.help: Constant value if no raster set

param.name: fI
param.label: Parameter sampling runs
param.help: Number of sampling cycles
